Text.Page: Greetings, my friend. How might my wares serve you?
Oh, I'm so sorry, but these items might be a bit too advanced for you. Have you tried the stables, or an armory?
Greetings, friend! Might my wares serve your needs?
Greetings, my friend. Are you interested in my wares?
Greetings, friend. How have you served the union today?
Greetings, my friend. How might I serve one who serves the union?
My apologies, friend, but you are still an associate member. The executive store is for those of the upper echelons.
I am sorry, my friend—so, so sorry—but your status as an associate member does not allow you to patronize the executive store.
Everywhere we look, nothing but discontent. Our leaders should be chosen from the most enlightened—not the strongest or most popular.
